response.summary: Mechanical engineer passionate for the product design willing to contribute with an integral approach in the develop of new products and projects that aim to be innovative, professionally challenging but mostly can improve the quality of life of people. My goal: taking ahead my profession between the dynamic industrial sector, linking research & innovation with the market requirements.

company.name: PERSICO GROUP
company.description:
Persico is one of the most skilled and versatile mould engineering companies worldwide, able to offer a full range of services for different industries:
• Automotive: Persico offers complete manufacturing systems for the automotive industry. Specialization and operating versatility, technological innovation and state-of-the-art customer service: these concepts underlie the Persico Automotive's commitment to providing targeted solutions for customers in the field of manufacturing equipment for interior and exterior parts of car and industrial vehicles. Persico provides full service, from co-design to the manufacture of tools, presses and lines by focusing on automatism.
• Rotomoulding: today in  the world of components for Agriculture, Construction, Trucks&Buses and Railways, customers are focused on lightness (vehicles that use less fuel), aesthetics (better-looking vehicles) and mechanical stress resistance (safer vehicles). Our mission is to design better quality heavy vehicles and equipment, by working in full synergy with our customers’ moulders to achieve the higher end-user satisfaction. 
Our products and services – from co-design to mould and machinery manufacturing – are developed to meet our customers' specific needs, by supplying moulds (CNC or Cast or Light Moulds) and automated rotomoulding machines (SMART ®).
• Marine: Persico Marine builds custom racing yachts for the world’s most renowned racing teams and private owners. Moreover, it supplies plugs, moulds and frames for the manufacture of motorboats and sailing yachts.  Persico is highly regarded as a skilled, full-service supplier, always ready to share its technological know-how with its clients.
• Medical: Persico is actively engaged in the healthcare field as a provider of innovative tools and equipment for medical application (for more details, visit: www.bielomatik.com)
• Aerospace: Persico is specialized in advanced composite moulding for the aeronautics and aerospace industries.
